ActCriminal Records Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Criminal Records Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CRIMINAL RECORDS REGULATIONS, in order to address the factors to be considered by the Parole Board of Canada in determining whether the granting of a pardon would bring the administration of justice into disrepute.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0236 Publication Date: 2011-11-09
